languages.text: Кто-то свил гнездо в старом контейнере. Простенькая лежанка и стол утопают в инфопластинах и бумагах, а стены исписаны невнятными вычислениями.
Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.
languages.original_text: Кто-то свил гнездо в старом контейнере. Простенькая лежанка и стол утопают в инфопластинах и бумагах, а стены исписаны невнятными вычислениями.

traits.locale_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

languages.text: Alguien se ha refugiado en el viejo contenedor. Hay una mesa y una cama sencillas, ambas enterradas bajo tablillas de datos y papeles, y cálculos ininteligibles cubren las paredes.
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: Alguien se ha refugiado en el viejo contenedor. Hay una mesa y una cama sencillas, ambas enterradas bajo tablillas de datos y papeles, y cálculos ininteligibles cubren las paredes.

languages.text: 有人把这个旧集装箱改造成了避难所。房间里摆着简单的床和桌子，周围都堆满了数据板和纸张，墙上写满了难以理解的数字与算式。
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: 有人把这个旧集装箱改造成了避难所。房间里摆着简单的床和桌子，周围都堆满了数据板和纸张，墙上写满了难以理解的数字与算式。

languages.text: 誰かが古いコンテナの中のシェルターを持って行った。簡素なベッドとテーブルがあり、両方ともデータスレートと紙に埋もれており、壁にはわかりにくい計算が走り書きされている。
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: 誰かが古いコンテナの中のシェルターを持って行った。簡素なベッドとテーブルがあり、両方ともデータスレートと紙に埋もれており、壁にはわかりにくい計算が走り書きされている。

languages.text: Jemand hat in dem alten Container Zuflucht gesucht. Du siehst ein einfaches Bett und einem Tisch voller Datablöcke und Papiere. Die Wände sind mit unleserlichen Formeln beschrieben.
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat in dem alten Container Zuflucht gesucht. Du siehst ein einfaches Bett und einem Tisch voller Datablöcke und Papiere. Die Wände sind mit unleserlichen Formeln beschrieben.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a manifestement trouvé refuge dans le vieux conteneur. Il contient un lit rudimentaire et une table, tous deux enfouis sous un monceau de plaques de données et de documents, tandis que les parois sont recouvertes de calculs incompréhensibles.
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a manifestement trouvé refuge dans le vieux conteneur. Il contient un lit rudimentaire et une table, tous deux enfouis sous un monceau de plaques de données et de documents, tandis que les parois sont recouvertes de calculs incompréhensibles.

languages.text: Birisi eski konteynere sığınmış. İçinde, üzerleri databela ve kâğıtla dolu olan basit birer yatak ve masa var. Ayrıca duvarlar, anlaşılmaz hesaplamalarla karalanmış.
languages.original_text: Someone has taken shelter in the old container. There is a simple bed and a table, both of which are buried in data-slates and papers, and the walls are scribbled over in unintelligible calculations.

traits.locale_text: Birisi eski konteynere sığınmış. İçinde, üzerleri databela ve kâğıtla dolu olan basit birer yatak ve masa var. Ayrıca duvarlar, anlaşılmaz hesaplamalarla karalanmış.
